name: FLEE (Take Up Tech)
description:
In this horror game, your objective will be to explore an abandoned building in order to recover all artefacts therein. However, evil spirits rode, be careful, listen well, and eliminate them. With each attempt, the number of enemies, traps and knives as well as their positions change. Be careful, you only have 3 lives…

Next update :

  • Character rework
  • Adding decorations
  • Adding a secret level
